div.p: This is the base conformance statement for FHIR. It represents a server that provides the full set of functionality defined by FHIR. It is provided to use as a template for system designers to build their own conformance statements from

tr.td: All the functionality defined in FHIR

description.value: This is the base conformance statement for FHIR. It represents a server that provides the full set of functionality defined by FHIR. It is provided to use as a template for system designers to build their own conformance statements from

documentation.value: All the functionality defined in FHIR
